An Annotation_plane is a type of
for the purpose of grouping annotation elements that are arranged on a plane within a 3D coordinate space. The plane may be bounded by a rectangle and styled so that it becomes visible.
ext_description.note: Because of limited numeric accuracy the annotation elements may not exactly lay on the plane. A receiving system may then need to project them to the plane.

ext_description.p: A Fill_area is a type of . A Fill_area is a bounded area containing colouring, hatching, or tiling.
ext_description.note: A Fill_area communicates some aspect of a physical part characteristic or distinguishes it from its surroundings.

example.p: Figure 3 depicts some fill area styles.
